name: MEASURE FOR MEASURE -CAVE VS IF
description:
As Gamindustri tears itself apart, two veterans seek to keep themselves—and their loved ones— together… at all costs.

Faced with unspeakable odds as two armies march to one last cruel fight, Cave and IF finally cross paths on the field of combat. Once friends with bonds that could never be shaken, both now stand on opposing sides of this twisted conflict; two incompatible ideologies, both equally desperate for survival. At long last… the time is nigh for their decisive battle!

Experience a tale of pride, betrayal, vengeance, and the never-ending pursuit of hope through the trials of two warriors, destined to meet on opposite sides of the battlefield!

14+ 'ending' paths, a novel-length story, and an old-school Password system for smooth navigation... and possibly discovering certain secrets along the way...

NOTE: It is highly recommended to play in fullscreen! Also, if you are planning to use the saving/loading feature through different sessions, be sure to have cookies enabled! For a first time playthrough, it is also recommended to NOT play the opening video, for it has a good chance to lag as everything else loads. Results may vary on better computers.

Game also features music, some tracks louder than others, so adjust your volume accordingly. Headphone users, be cautious!

(This is a fangame based on the Hyperdimension Neptunia series, more specifically set several years after mk2. Based on ghostdominion6's fanfiction series.)

Recommended for playing in Mozilla Firefox and/or Google Chrome, latest versions. Not confirmed to work with any other browsers, but Internet Explorer and Microsoft Edge are NOT compatible!

WINDOWS XP USERS: Videos will most likely not play, so choose to skip the videos whenever a prompt shows up. If problems persist/you want to watch the videos still, feel free to leave a message or request, and we can help you out!

Ways to contact us off of itch.io:

Fanfiction.net: ghostdominion6

PSN: Either sonicnobody5 (ghost) OR liveintheevil66 (kurtiszhev)

Email: usjintx@live.com (kurtiszhev)

System requirements: there are occasional slow-downs and hiccups on computers running Windows 8/10 with less than 4 GB of RAM. At least 8 GB of RAM is suggested for the best experience!

Some links may lead to outside websites (namely, fanfiction.net), and open up new tabs to do so. These are all proven to be safe, and hovering over the link will warn you beforehand. None of these are necessary to be selected in order to play.

Oh, and bring a pen and pencil while you're at it, just in case (or just keep a notepad file open somewhere)...
